import React, {Component} from "react" import AuthenticationService from "@services/AuthenticationService.js" import { FloatingLabelsPassword, FloatingLabelsPhone, FloatingLabelsEmail } from '@components/forms/floating_labels/index.js' import {Container, Row, Col, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' class Login extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { areacode: '+972', phone: '', email: '', isValidPhoneNumber: true, password: '', isvalidPassword: true, } } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } continueClicked = async (event) => { //if(AuthenticationService.executeAuthenticationService(this.state.phonenumber, this.state.password)){ AuthenticationService.registerSuccessfulLogin(this.state.phonenumber) this.props.history.push('/search/match/') //} this.setState({ isvalidPassword: false }) } render(){ return ( <>

Enter your number phone:

Or

Enter your email:

Enter your password:

 < Button size="lg" className='mb-2 mt-3 w-50' onClick={this.CreateAccountClicked} >Login
) } } export default Login;
